Key Arguments: The legislation undermines democratic principles and freedom of speech.
The current system is functioning well and does not need change.
The bill could be a step backwards for the nation.
There is a need for open and honest debate without government interference.
Notable Quotes: I am most upset that you do not trust your people to make good decisions.
Let us have the right to have an open and honest debate, where we respect each other and let the logical truth be aired and wisdom prevail.
I fear this proposed bill will not improve our nation but rather be a step backwards.
